text: agricultural practices gives you a chance to explore experience and learn knowledge and practical skills valued in farming you'll learn about the management practices of animal and plant industries in hands-on ways you should study agricultural practices if you're interested in working in agriculture including careers in agribusiness aquaculture food technology or Environmental Management
